scripts.deploy:staging: sh -ac '. .env.staging; react-scripts build' && node sw-generator.js && node -e "console.log('sw done')" && firebase deploy -P staging --only hosting
scripts.deploy:production: sh -ac '. .env.production; react-scripts build' && node sw-generator.js && node -e "console.log('sw done')" && firebase deploy -P default --only hosting
scripts.deploy: sh -ac '. .env.staging; react-scripts build' && node sw-generator.js && node -e "console.log('sw done')" && firebase deploy -P staging --only hosting
scripts.production: react-scripts build && node sw-generator.js && node -e "console.log('sw done')" && firebase deploy -P staging --only hosting
